EventComponent.Name: Sports Events - 4th of July Lawn Games and BBQ
EventComponent.Title: 4th of July Lawn Games and BBQ
EventComponent.Abstract: 4th of July Lawn Games and BBQ will be held at the Upper Fields from 11 am to 3 pm. The activities will be free. The fee for hotdog and a drink is $1.50, hamburger and a drink is $2.00.
